button.detail.description: Button text for viewing the details of the referral history on the website.

button.withdrawal.description: Button text for withdrawing the referral earnings from the website.

button.query.description: Button text for querying the referral earnings on the website.

field.id.description: A unique identifier for the referral, referring to the referrals of the API service website.

field.percentage.description: The percentage of referral earnings calculated based on the order amount.

field.price.description: The order amount used to calculate referral earnings.

field.reward.description: The referral earnings calculated based on the order amount and the referral earnings percentage.

field.userId.description: A unique identifier for the user, referring to users of the API service website.

field.userEmail.description: The email address of the user.

field.createdAt.description: The time when the referral was created.

field.level.description: The level of the referral, used to calculate referral earnings.

field.threshold.description: The threshold for referral earnings, used for withdrawing referral earnings.

field.inviteeId.description: A unique identifier for the inviter, referring to the person who invited the invitee to the API service website.

field.isVerified.description: A flag indicating whether the referred user has been verified with real information.

message.deltaPriceForNextLevel.description: The difference between the current order amount and the threshold for the next level.

message.developingWithDrawal.message: Please join customer service to process withdrawals; the withdrawal will incur related income tax.
message.developingWithDrawal.description: A message indicating that the withdrawal feature is under development.

message.technicalDetail.description: Technical details about the implementation of the referral system.

message.distributionQrDescription.message: Referral QR Code (same as link content)
message.distributionQrDescription.description: Description of the referral QR code.

message.distributionLink.description: The referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: A message indicating that the referral information has been successfully updated.

message.distributionLinkDescription.message: If a customer registers on this platform through this link or QR code, they will be permanently bound as your downline customer, and all consumption orders made by the customer on this platform will return to your account according to the current distribution ratio.

message.distributionLinkDescription2.message: This link contains your User ID. When customers open the link, your User ID will be recorded in the customer's browser as Cookies, valid for seven days. Within seven days, if the customer registers on this platform by scanning the code, your User ID will be uploaded to the registration server along with the Cookies, and the customer can be bound as your downline customer.

title.price.description: The total amount of the referral order, used to calculate referral earnings.

title.reward.description: The total referral reward, calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

title.level.description: Referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.percentage.description: The referral earnings percentage used for calculating referral earnings.

title.currentLevel.description: The current referral level used for calculating referral earnings.

title.nextLevel.description: The next referral level used for calculating referral earnings.

title.currentPercentage.description: The current referral earnings percentage used for calculating referral earnings.

title.nextPercentage.description: The referral earnings percentage for the next level, used for calculating referral earnings.

title.levelInfo.description: Information about the referral level, used for calculating referral earnings.

title.distributionLink.description: The referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

title.inviteesCount.description: The total number of invitees used for calculating referral earnings.
